TCName.name: VerifyLTOLocationsSM
TCName.getinUseCt: select count(*) from zwowt_c_lto_location where location_type='I'
TCName.getnotinUseCt: select count(*) from zwowt_c_lto_location where location_type='N'

TCName.name: ValidateLTOLocationsSM
TCName.getlocationName: select location_name from zwowt_c_lto_location where location_type='I'
TCName.getlocationSeq: select LOCATION_NAME from zwowt_c_lto_location where location_name like 'TEST%' order by LOCATION_SEQ desc
TCName.getlocationType: select LOCATION_TYPE from zwowt_c_lto_location where location_name='TEST'

TCName.name: VerifyLTONonInUSeLocSM
TCName.getAisle: select Aisle from ZWOWT_C_LTO_AISLE where Location_id in (select LOCATION_ID from zwowt_c_lto_location where location_name like 'TEST' order by LOCATION_SEQ desc )
TCName.getnotInuseLoc: select location_name from zwowt_c_lto_location where location_type='N'
